content.text:
A large number of people were asked to vote for their favorite sport from Cricket, Football, Kabaddi, Tennis and Basketball.
Central angles :
  1. Sector 1 - tennis - \(72^o\)
  2. Sector 2 - kabaddi - \(36^o\)
  3. Sector 3 - cricket - \(144^o\)
  4. Sector 4 - football - \(90^o\)
  5. Sector 5 - basketball - \(18^o\)
